Returns:

createTool

public static com.kuka.roboticsAPI.geometricModel.PhysicalObject createTool(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.deviceModel.LBR robotToBeAttached,
                                                                            java.lang.String toolName,
                                                                            double[] translationVectorInMM,
                                                                            double mass,
                                                                            double[] centerOfMassInMillimeter)
Create a tool under program control.

Parameters:
robotToBeAttached - the robot to which the tool shall be attached
toolName - Name of the tool
translationVectorInMM - the offset Translation of the tool
mass - Mass in kg
centerOfMassInMillimeter - a 3dim Vector [x,y,z] in Millimeter w.r.t. the flange position of the Robot
Returns:
the Tool attached to the robot Note: If you like to create a more complex tool or rotations, please use other routines

Create a tool under program control from a tooltemplate.

Parameters:
robotToBeAttached -
toolTemplateName - Name of the tool
dataFile - Name of the datafile which contains the tool, should not be null
theControllersContext - the context of the application
Returns:
the created tool
